channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The stable uniqueness theorem for unitary tensor category equivariant KK-theory
item.description: arXiv:2410.23935v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We introduce the Cuntz-Thomsen picture of $\mathcal{C}$-equivariant Kasparov theory, denoted $\mathrm{KK}^\mathcal{C}$, for a unitary tensor category $\mathcal{C}$ with countably many isomorphism classes of simple objects. We use this description of $\mathrm{KK}^\mathcal{C}$ to prove the stable uniqueness theorem in this setting.
item.dc:creator: Sergio Gir\'on Pacheco, Kan Kitamura, Robert Neagu

item.title: Motivic monodromy and p-adic cohomology theories
item.description: arXiv:2306.05099v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We build a unified framework for the study of monodromy operators and weight filtrations of cohomology theories for varieties over a local field. As an application, we give a streamlined definition of Hyodo-Kato cohomology without recourse to log-geometry, as predicted by Fontaine, and we produce an induced Clemens-Schmid chain complex.
item.dc:creator: Federico Binda, Martin Gallauer, Alberto Vezzani
